title: What are some of the best books on Numerology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Numerology as we know is divided into two parts. One is followed in east and another is followed in west. Both the systems have their advantages and disadvantages. Eastern NumerologyIn this, letters are assigned values from 1–8. No letter has been assigned the value 9 since ancient Hindus felt that 9 is complete in itself and represents the Almighty therefore no number can represent the almighty. The below mentioned books follow this methodology. Book of numbers by CheiroAnk Vidya by Gopesh kumar ojhaA complete guide to numerology by BK ChaturvediWestern NumerologyThis method was developed in ancient Greece. Here the numbers are assigned vakues from 1–9 in a cyclic order. A is represented by 1, B by 2 till I which is representsed by 9. Then J is given value 1 and the order follows. This method is easier to learn. Books that follow this method are Numerology by Matthew Oliver Goodwin, Two volumes. This is a complete book to learn about numerology.Numerology by Tom monte and Hans Decoz. This is more of a reference book.I have read the above books and found both the systems to be correct. Eastern methods needs more time to learn and interpret. The planets are assigned rulership to numbers. So it becomes more difficilt to interpret. Western methods are easy to learn and interpret. PS: i will keep on adding books to this list when i will read them and find them useful since most books are a mere copy or reproduction of some earlier written book. Till then the above mentioned list is complete in itself to help you understand numerology.Numerologers like M Kattkar, AV Kapil, Harish Johari along with others have written books on this subject. You can read them as well.
